segment.source: New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate cmdlet
segment.target: New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate cmdlet

segment.source: New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate cmdlet
segment.target: New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate cmdlet

segment.source: New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate cmdlet
segment.target: New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate cmdlet

segment.source: Use the New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate cmdlet to create a new request for update (RFU) that contains Microsoft AK-only binaries for a given product, CPU, update type, source and target Microsoft OS version numbers, along with the target mobile operator name, and target phone name.
segment.target: Use the New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate cmdlet to create a new request for update (RFU) that contains Microsoft AK-only binaries for a given product, CPU, update type, source and target Microsoft OS version numbers, along with the target mobile operator name, and target phone name.

segment.source: Beginning with the release of Windows 10, OEMs can no longer submit OS-only updates for retail devices by using the New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate cmdlet.
segment.target: Beginning with the release of Windows 10, OEMs can no longer submit OS-only updates for retail devices by using the New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate cmdlet.

segment.source: OS-only updates for retail devices will be provided by Microsoft on Windows Update.
segment.target: OS-only updates for retail devices will be provided by Microsoft on Windows Update.

segment.source: OEMs can continue to submit OS-only updates for Trial and PartnerSelfHost preview environments.
segment.target: OEMs can continue to submit OS-only updates for Trial and PartnerSelfHost preview environments.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: You need to submit an update for each Phone-Operator pairing.
segment.target: You need to submit an update for each Phone-Operator pairing.

segment.source: For example, if you have two phones on a specific Mobile Operator, you will need to submit two request for updates (RFU).
segment.target: For example, if you have two phones on a specific Mobile Operator, you will need to submit two request for updates (RFU).

segment.source: If you have a phone on four different MOs, you will need to submit four RFUs.
segment.target: If you have a phone on four different MOs, you will need to submit four RFUs.

segment.source: This is the syntax for New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate:
segment.target: This is the syntax for New-RequestForMicrosoftUpdate:

segment.source: Syntax
segment.target: Syntax

segment.source: Parameters
segment.target: Parameters

segment.source: Typically, the only parameters that are specified for this cmdlet are SourceOSVersion, TargetOSVersion, RequestForUpdateType, OemDeviceName, and MOId.
segment.target: Typically, the only parameters that are specified for this cmdlet are SourceOSVersion, TargetOSVersion, RequestForUpdateType, OemDeviceName, and MOId.

segment.source: The SourceOSVersion is the version of the previous update.
segment.target: The SourceOSVersion is the version of the previous update.

segment.source: This setting is recommended, and helps guard against publishing updates that could potentially cause update errors.
segment.target: This setting is recommended, and helps guard against publishing updates that could potentially cause update errors.

segment.source: The device update publishing service reserves the right to reject RFUs that do not include the SourceOSVersion of the previous update.
segment.target: The device update publishing service reserves the right to reject RFUs that do not include the SourceOSVersion of the previous update.

segment.source: For more info on versioning, see Update requirements.
segment.target: For more info on versioning, see Update requirements.

segment.source: The TargetOS version is the version of the update being submitted.
segment.target: The TargetOS version is the version of the update being submitted.

segment.source: The RequestForUpdateType must be set to one of the two values summarized here.
segment.target: The RequestForUpdateType must be set to one of the two values summarized here.

segment.source: RequestForUpdateType
segment.target: RequestForUpdateType

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: RetailServicing
segment.target: RetailServicing

segment.source: OEM BSP updates are intended to service in-market devices.
segment.target: OEM BSP updates are intended to service in-market devices.

segment.source: These updates are delivered as part of the planned OEM update cadence (A4, A5, A6, etc.).
segment.target: These updates are delivered as part of the planned OEM update cadence (A4, A5, A6, etc.).

segment.source: Trial
segment.target: Trial

segment.source: Trial updates are used with both Mobile Operator OTA Trials and OEM Engineering Trials.
segment.target: Trial updates are used with both Mobile Operator OTA Trials and OEM Engineering Trials.

segment.source: Mobile Operator OTA Trials – OEM BSP updates are intended to allow MOs to achieve new device commercialization.
segment.target: Mobile Operator OTA Trials – OEM BSP updates are intended to allow MOs to achieve new device commercialization.

segment.source: OEM Engineering Trials – OEM RD trials are intended to enable OEMs to test the updateability of device image candidates.
segment.target: OEM Engineering Trials – OEM RD trials are intended to enable OEMs to test the updateability of device image candidates.

segment.source: The OemDeviceName is the name at which the request for update is being targeted.
segment.target: The OemDeviceName is the name at which the request for update is being targeted.

segment.source: This is only required if devices are updating to Windows Phone 8.1 or higher.
segment.target: This is only required if devices are updating to Windows Phone 8.1 or higher.

segment.source: The MOId is the mobile operator at which the request for update is being targeted.
segment.target: The MOId is the mobile operator at which the request for update is being targeted.

segment.target: Scenarios

segment.source: Create a new RFU for use in trials
segment.target: Create a new RFU for use in trials

segment.target: Scenario prerequisites

segment.source: There is a desire to submit a new request for update for trials, for example, for OEM R&D.
segment.target: There is a desire to submit a new request for update for trials, for example, for OEM R&D.
